bioconda.name: samtools
bioconda.summary: Tools for dealing with SAM, BAM and CRAM files

biocontainers.name: samtools
biocontainers.summary: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the sam format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

biotools.summary: SAMtools and BCFtools are widely used programs for processing and analysing high-throughput sequencing data. They include tools for file format conversion and manipulation, sorting, querying, statistics, variant calling, and effect analysis amongst other methods.

bioschemas.name: SAMtools
bioschemas.summary: SAMtools and BCFtools are widely used programs for processing and analysing high-throughput sequencing data. They include tools for file format conversion and manipulation, sorting, querying, statistics, variant calling, and effect analysis amongst other methods.
